members.joinCircumstances: Founded and leads the Amigo Pirates as their captain.
Serves as Largo's brother and second-in-command.

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Straw Hats and Villagers
keyMoments.description: The Amigo Pirates engage in combat with Zoro, Sanji, and the villagers of Little East Blue.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's final stand before their defeat and imprisonment.

keyMoments.title: Largo Defeated by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Captain Largo is defeated by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gigant Pistol, marking the crew's downfall.
keyMoments.significance: The captain's defeat leads to the crew's capture and failure of their mission.

keyMoments.title: Entire Crew Imprisoned
keyMoments.description: The Amigo Pirates are captured and locked in a cage by the residents of Little East Blue.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Amigo Pirates' threat and their failure to join Shiki's fleet.

ships.description: The crew's mariachi-themed ship, destroyed when Largo was sent flying into it by Luffy's Gigant Pistol.

affiliations.description: Largo attempted to join Shiki's fleet by capturing Boss, but failed

members.joinCircumstances: Founder and leader of the Golden Lion Pirates.
Serves as Shiki's chief scientist, responsible for creating modified creatures.

keyMoments.title: Modified Creature Army Revealed
keyMoments.description: Shiki's plan to create an army of modified super-animals for global conquest is revealed.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the scope of Shiki's ambitions and sets up the Strong World movie conflict.

keyMoments.title: Shiki Continues Ultimate Plan
keyMoments.description: Despite Largo's failure, Shiki dismisses it as a minor setback and continues monitoring his modified creatures.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that the Golden Lion Pirates' plans are much larger than just capturing Boss.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a ship's wheel embedded in the head and crossed swords

keyMoments.title: Defeat Amigo Pirates and Save Little East Blue
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats successfully protect Little East Blue from the Amigo Pirates, with Luffy defeating Largo.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's heroism and ability to protect innocent people, changing Yoko's view of pirates.

keyMoments.title: Leave Little East Blue
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats depart the island after saving it, continuing their journey.
keyMoments.significance: Concludes their involvement in the Little East Blue Arc and returns them to their main quest.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
